tool_description: Tracks maintenance schedules, records service history, and manages equipment downtime for diagnostic imaging equipment.

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for the imaging equipment

maintenance_type.description: Type of maintenance (preventive, corrective, calibration, inspection)

scheduled_date.description: Date and time for scheduled maintenance

duration_hours.description: Expected duration of maintenance in hours (0.5-24)

service_provider.description: Name of the maintenance service provider or technician

description.description: Description of maintenance work to be performed

error_messages: Equipment not found: The specified equipment_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid maintenance type: Use one of [preventive, corrective, calibration, inspection].
Invalid scheduled date: Date must be in the future and during service hours.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 0.5 and 24 hours.
Service provider not found: The specified service provider is not registered.
Scheduling conflict: Maintenance time conflicts with existing appointments or maintenance.
usage: Provide equipment_id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date, duration_hours, and service_provider to schedule equipment maintenance and track service history.

maintenance_id.description: Unique identifier for the maintenance record

affected_appointments.description: Array of appointment IDs that need to be rescheduled due to maintenance

equipment_status.description: Current operational status of the equipment

next_due_date.description: Date when next maintenance is due
